resources.string: "Which of the following behaviors qualifies as a form of abuse?"
a. Using online communities or cell phones to control, intimidate, or humiliate you
b. Making you feel guilty or immature when you don’t consent to sexual activity
c. Accusing you of cheating and often being jealous of your outside relationships
Which of the following behaviors could be a form of positive consent?
a. Assuming permission to engage in a sexual act with someone because you two have done it in the past
b. Using physical cues to let somebody know you would be comfortable taking things to the next level
c. Believing that a lack of a verbal refusal is an invitation to continue
d. Interpretation of kissing, flirting, or certain types of clothing (or lack thereof) as an invitation for anything more
All except which of the following are positive ways to support someone who has been sexually assaulted?
a. Offering to be there when the survivor decides to seek medical attention or plans to report their assault
b. Encouraging them to practice good self-care during this difficult time
c. Listening and communicating without judgement
d. Pressuring them to engage in activities they aren’t ready to do yet
